children.text: Informe o e-mail cadastrado e lhe enviaremos um e-mail para redefinição de senha

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT r.* FROM public.reviews r
JOIN public.users u
ON r.id_user=u.id AND {{appsmith.store.user_email}}=u.email
WHERE id_movie={{moviesList.selectedItem.id}};

-- Please enter a valid table name and hit RUN

SELECT * FROM public.reviews r
JOIN public.users u
ON r.id_user=u.id AND {{appsmith.store.user_email}}=u.email
WHERE id_movie={{moviesList.selectedItem.id}};

-- Please enter a valid table name and hit RUN

INSERT INTO public.reviews (id_user, id_movie, rate, review)
SELECT
    (SELECT id FROM public.users WHERE email = {{appsmith.store.user_email}}),
    {{moviesList.selectedItem.id}},
    {{ratingInput.value}},
    {{reviewInput.text}};


-- Please enter a valid table name and hit RUN
